description:
Space: Uncharted is a slow-paced massively-multiplayer online (MMO) strategy game. 

This app grants access to all games starting in January and February (see below). Games in future months will require the next version of the app, similar to a monthly subscription.  

* Players colonize planets, construct buildings, create fleets of ships, explore the galaxy, form alliances with friends, & conquer other enemies’ territory. 
* Each game can support thousands of players in the same galaxy. 
* Space is a strategy game, and runs slowly to allow players to choose actions carefully and collaborate with allies. Each game can take several weeks to a month, so players need only check in on their progress a few times a day. 
* In-game, email, and/or txt notifications alert you to unfolding events, such as discovering new planets or being attacked. 

Join the battle! During our launch months of January and February, there will be two regular games (lasting 2-4 weeks) and a new speed game (lasting 1-2 weeks) every Wednesday.  This app grants access to all of these games.  The regular games will start on January 27th and February 17th, but you can join the games before then to start forming alliances.  24 hours before game start, players will be placed on the map and can begin issuing orders, but no action will take place until the game starts.
